name: Matús Mihalák
content: Matúš Mihalák Skip to content Assistant professor in the Department of Advanced Computing Sciences of Maastricht University Contact: Postal Address:Visitors Address: Email: matus.mihalak "ATT" maastrichtuniversity.nlDepartment of Data Science and Knowledge EngineeringRoom 1.004 Phone: +31 (0)43 38 82007Postbus 616Bouillonstraat 8-10 6200MD Maastricht6211LN Maastricht The NetherlandsThe Netherlands Research Interests: algorithm design and analysis (exact, approximation, online algorithms); combinatorial optimization; computational game theory; Applications of research: transportation; logistics; communication networks; agent-based computing; manufacturing
